Package com.github.actionfx.core.instrumentation

Interface ActionFXEnhancer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionFXByteBuddyEnhancer
    public interface ActionFXEnhancer
    Interface for byte code enhancer. Enhancements is possible either via instrumentation agents or sub-classing. As the actual implementation is highly framework specific, we abstract away the technology with this interface.
    Author:
    koster

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  ActionFXEnhancer.EnhancementStrategy
      Defines available enhancement strategies for ActionFX.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String VIEW_FIELD_NAME
      the name of the field where the view is expected under.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean agentInstalled()
      Flag that signalizes, whether the byte-code instrumentation agent is already installed.
      java.lang.Class<?> enhanceClass​(java.lang.Class<?> originalClass)
      Enhances the given originalClass by sub-classing and adding the required behavior for ActionFX.
      void installAgent()
      Installs the byte code instrumentation for ActionFX.

    • Field Detail

      • VIEW_FIELD_NAME

        static final java.lang.String VIEW_FIELD_NAME
        the name of the field where the view is expected under. Enhancer are required to add this field to a controller.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • installAgent

        void installAgent()
        Installs the byte code instrumentation for ActionFX. This method must be called as early as possible in the application execution.s

      • agentInstalled

        boolean agentInstalled()
        Flag that signalizes, whether the byte-code instrumentation agent is already installed.
        Returns:
        true, if the byte-code instrumentation agent is already installed, false, if the agent is not installed.

      • enhanceClass

        java.lang.Class<?> enhanceClass​(java.lang.Class<?> originalClass)
        Enhances the given originalClass by sub-classing and adding the required behavior for ActionFX.
        Parameters:
        originalClass - the original class to enhance
        Returns:
        the sub-class with enhanced behavior
